alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bergen and Rockland Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ridgewood, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New City, Ridgewood, Monsey, Nanuet, Spring Valley, Westwood, Hillsdale, Washington Township, Park Ridge, Airmont, Upper Saddle River, Chestnut Ridge, Montvale, Hillcrest and New Square. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
